issue.title: androidauthority.com
issue.body: ### Prerequisites - [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml); - [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue; - [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date; - [x] Browser version is up-to-date; - [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue. ### What product do you use? Other ad blocker ### AdGuard version 3.6 ### What type of problem have you encountered? Website or app doesn't work properly ### Which browser(s) do you use? Chrome ### Which device do you use? Desktop ### Where is the problem encountered? https://www.androidauthority.com/mobile/ ### Ad Blocking AdGuard Base filter ### Privacy _No response_ ### Social Widgets _No response_ ### Annoyances _No response_ ### Security _No response_ ### Other _No response_ ### DNS filters _No response_ ### Language-specific _No response_ ### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled? _No response_ ### Add your comment and screenshots 1. The problem is caused by this filter `AdGuard – Ads` - https://filters.adtidy.org/extension/ublock/filters/2_without_easylist.txt When the specified filter is enabled - all site content is hidden. When the specified filter is disabled - all site content is visible and functional. **Open this exact address**: https://www.androidauthority.com/mobile/ 2. Screenshots Browser name and version: **Chromium v.140.0.7339.100** ### Privacy - [x] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body: If you use uBlock Origin Lite, then new rules will be available in one of the next extension updates (the same apply to AdGuard MV3 extension).

comment.body:
Please wait for filters update.
It should be available in about 2 hours.

comment.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://play.sooplive.co.kr/ytnlive](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fplay.sooplive.co.kr%2Fytnlive) ### Comment > 필터리스트 업데이트 이후에도 동일한 증상 발생합니다 > 정상적으로 화면이 나오기까지 10초 이상걸립니다 > 다른 창에 다른 채널을 틀면 멀쩡히 나오던 채널도 버퍼링이 걸립니다 > 해당 사이트에서 비활성화하여도 증상이 같습니다 > 완전히 애드가드를 종료해야지만 정상적으로 페이지가 작동합니다 ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adtidy.org/sitereports/phg5pt2v73ko80488wks8gckkcgggssd1v2b6q535s.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adtidy.org/sitereports/sm84iqzwdzkc4oks48sco44kkc444cgaaig2jfjlds.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Windows v7.21.3 (5089) System version: | `Microsoft Windows NT 10.0.19045.0` Browser: | Chrome License type: | paid AdGuard driver: | WFP Tracking protection: | **General settings**:
Block trackers,
Strip URLs from tracking parameters,
Hide your search queries,
Send Do-Not-Track header

**Tracking methods**:
Self-destructing third-party cookies (0),
Disable cache for third-party requests

**Browser API**:
Block Flash

**Windows tracking**:
Disable Windows Telemetry,
Turn off Advertising ID,
Disable Windows Defender automatic samples submission

**Miscellaneous**:
Hide your Referrer from third-parties (play.sooplive.co.kr),
Hide your IP address,
Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests DNS filtering: | server: `https://dns.adguard-dns.com/dns-query`

AdGuard Base
